data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It's a Perl/Tk widget, so I placed it under the Tk namespace. It
    will view POD, but eventually I want to add some extensions to the
    POD language that will not display on standard POD viewers, so I
    called it Peapod.

    extensions will be via the

    =for Peapod

    POD directive.
